allowOrigin.description: 允許來自於 %S 的請求

allowOriginToDestination.description: 允許由 %1$S 至 %2$S 的請求

allowOriginTemporarily.description: 暫時允許來自於 %S 的請求

allowDestinationTemporarily.description: 暫時允許所有到 %S 的請求

allowOriginToDestinationTemporarily.description: 暫時允許從 %1$S 到 %2$S 的請求

denyOrigin.description: 禁止所有來自於 %S 的請求

denyDestination.description: 禁止所有到 %S 的請求

denyOriginToDestination.description: 禁止由 %1$S 到 %2$S 的請求

unrestrictedOrigin.description: 無法阻擋來自於 %S 的請求

redirectNotification.message: This webpage has asked to redirect to %S
redirectNotification.description: 本網站請求重新導向至 %S

requestLogIsEmpty.message: The Request Log is initially empty.
requestLogIsEmpty.description: 請求記錄一開始是空白的。

requestLogDirections.message: Log entries will appear when you visit web pages.
requestLogDirections.description: 在您瀏覽網頁時會產生記錄。

autoReload.message: Reload current page when whitelist is changed
autoReload.description: 更改白名單後重新載入目前頁面

allowAddingNonTemporaryRulesInPBM.message: Allow adding non-temporary rules when using Private Browsing Mode
allowAddingNonTemporaryRulesInPBM.description: 私密瀏覽時允許永久性的白名單

rp.menu.revokeTemporaryPermissions.description: 撤銷所有暫時性的允許

siteInfo.confirm.message: You're about to ask for information about the

site
by submitting a query to %2$S.
Do you want to continue?
siteInfo.confirm.description: 您可能透過一個查詢給 %2$S 來索取關於 %1$S 網站的資訊，是否要繼續？
